gate.alignment.gui
Class AlignmentFactory

java.lang.Object
  gate.alignment.gui.AlignmentFactory

public class AlignmentFactory
extends Object

This class provides various methods that help in alignment process.

Author:
niraj

Field Summary
static String ALIGNMENT_FEATURE_NAME
          Alignments are stored as a document feature by default under this feature name
protected  CompoundDocument compoundDocument
          The document that is being processed for alignment

                        String tgtInputAS,
                        String srcTokenAnnotationType,
                        String tgtTokenAnnotationType,
                        String srcUnitAnnotationType,
                        String tgtUnitAnnotationType,
                        String iteratingMethodClassName)
                 throws Exception
AlignmentFactory makes alignment easier

Parameters:
compoundDocument - -> document where we want to achieve alignment
inputAS - -> name of the inputAnnotationSet
tokenAnnotationType - -> the level at what we want to achieve alignment (e.g. Token or may be some other annotation type)
unitAnnotationType - -> AlignedParentAnnotationType (e.g. if sentences are already aligned)
Throws:
Exception
